models.name: todo_list_guest_visitors
models.description: Registry of unauthenticated visitor actors for the Minimal Todo List service. Represents anonymous users that may interact with public entry points before authentication. These entries are standalone within the Actors domain and are not linked to business entities in this minimal scope. Useful for optional auditing or policy analysis; typically not user-managed directly. No authentication credentials are stored here.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Creation timestamp for this guest visitor actor record.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Last update timestamp for this record, refreshed on any modification.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft deletion timestamp to mark this actor as logically removed or deactivated. Null means active.

models.name: todo_list_todo_members
models.description: Actor records for authenticated members of the Minimal Todo List service. Represents owners of personal Todos. Includes authentication fields for password-based login and a unique email identifier. Emails should be normalized to lowercase at the application layer; for DB-level case-insensitive uniqueness, consider a functional unique index on lower(email) via migration. Passwords are never stored in plaintext; store only strong password hashes (Argon2id/Bcrypt).

plainFields.name: email
plainFields.description: Member’s login identifier (email). Must be unique across members. Normalize to lowercase at application layer; business policy may require case-insensitive uniqueness.

plainFields.name: password_hash
plainFields.description: Hashed password for authentication (e.g., Argon2id/Bcrypt). Plaintext passwords must never be stored.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Creation timestamp for this member actor record.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Last update timestamp for this record, refreshed on any modification.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft deletion timestamp to mark this actor as logically removed or deactivated. Null means active.

models.name: todo_list_system_admins
models.description: Actor records for administrative users responsible for service-level settings and policy oversight. Requires authentication via unique email and password_hash. Emails should be normalized to lowercase at the application layer; for DB-level case-insensitive uniqueness consider functional unique index on lower(email) via migration. No routine access to private Todos is implied; access is policy-gated and audited.

plainFields.name: email
plainFields.description: Administrator’s login identifier (email). Must be unique across admins. Normalize to lowercase at application layer; business policy may require case-insensitive uniqueness.

plainFields.name: password_hash
plainFields.description: Hashed password for authentication (e.g., Argon2id/Bcrypt). Plaintext passwords must never be stored.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Creation timestamp for this system admin actor record.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Last update timestamp for this record, refreshed on any modification.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft deletion timestamp to mark this actor as logically removed or deactivated. Null means active.

models.name: todo_list_todos
models.description: Core Todo items for the minimal personal task list. Each record belongs to exactly one member (owner) and represents a single task with a required title and a simple completion state. Business operations include create, list (scoped to owner), update title, toggle complete/uncomplete, and delete. Completion timestamp is recorded when a Todo transitions to completed and cleared when uncompleted. No soft deletion is used in minimal scope; created_at/updated_at track lifecycle changes.

foreignFields.name: todo_list_todo_member_id
foreignFields.description: Owner member's {@link todo_list_todo_members.id}. Establishes strict per-owner scoping for all Todo operations.

plainFields.name: title
plainFields.description: Required single-line task title. Application enforces trimming and length policy (e.g., 1–100 chars) and disallows newline characters per business rules.

plainFields.name: is_completed
plainFields.description: Completion state of the Todo. Defaults to false on creation; toggled explicitly by the user.

plainFields.name: completed_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp recorded when the Todo transitions to completed. Cleared when the Todo is marked active (uncompleted).

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Creation timestamp for the Todo. Set once at creation and never modified thereafter.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Last modification timestamp. Updated whenever mutable fields change (title or completion state).
